text: At the Edge of the Law () is a 1992 Argentine action thriller movie directed and written by Juan Carlos Desanzo. It stars Rodolfo Ranni, Gerardo Romano, Katja Alemann and Ulises Dumont. == Other websites == * Category:1992 action movies Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:Argentine action movies Category:Argentine thriller movies
title: At the Edge of the Law
